```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(glmnet)
prostate <- read.delim("prostate.data")
head(prostate)

x <- prostate[, 2:9]
y <- prostate[, 10]

set.seed(10)
1:nrow(x)

train.data <- subset(prostate, train==TRUE)
test.data <- subset(prostate, train==FALSE)

myfit <- lm(lpsa~., data=train.data[, 2:10])

summary(myfit)
predictions <- predict(myfit, test.data[, 2:9])
predictions

err<- sum((predictions-test.data[,10])^2)
err

```

```{r}
library(leaps)

a <- step(myfit, k=2)
object <- summary(a)

print("--------------")
a <- step(myfit, k=log(67))
object <- summary(a)
```
